mapper.insert: INSERT INTO travelinfo (title, infotype, infodate, city_id, content, member_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{infotype}, #{infodate}, #{cityId}, #{content}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select idx, title, view, created_at, updated_at, infotype, infodate, city_id, content, member_id from travelinfo
select idx, title, `view` AS view, created_at, updated_at, infotype, infodate, city_id, content, member_id from travelinfo where idx=#{idx}
mapper.update: update travelinfo set title=#{title}, infotype=#{infotype}, infodate=#{infodate}, city_id=#{cityId}, content=#{content}, updated_at = NOW() where idx=#{idx} and member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.delete: delete from travelinfo where idx = #{idx} and member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT ti.idx, ti.title, ti.member_id, tii.saved_name AS thumbnail FROM travelinfo ti LEFT JOIN travelinfo_image tii ON tii.travelinfo_idx = ti.idx AND tii.created_at = ( SELECT MIN(created_at) FROM travelinfo_image WHERE travelinfo_idx = ti.idx ) ORDER BY ti.view DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT idx, title, member_id, created_at FROM travelinfo WHERE member_id=#{memberId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT t.idx, t.title, t.view, t.created_at AS createdAt, t.infotype, t.infodate, c.name AS cityName, m.nickname AS memberNickname FROM travelinfo t LEFT JOIN city c ON t.city_id = c.id LEFT JOIN member m ON t.member_id = m.id ORDER BY t.created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE travelinfo SET view = view + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, land_id FROM country ORDER BY name
SELECT id, name, country_id FROM city ORDER BY name
SELECT id, name, country_id FROM city where id = #{id}

SELECT ti.idx, ti.title, ti.`view`, ti.content, ti.infotype, ti.infodate, ti.member_id, c.id AS city_id, c.name AS city_name, co.id AS country_id, co.name AS country_name FROM travelinfo ti JOIN city c ON ti.city_id = c.id JOIN country co ON c.country_id = co.id WHERE ti.idx = #{idx}
